```{r}
#| label: setup

library(dplyr)
library(vdemdata)

dem_data <- vdem |>
  filter(year == 2000) |>
  select(
    country = country_name, 
    polyarchy = v2x_polyarchy,
    clientelism = v2xnp_client,
    corruption = v2xnp_regcorr,
    womens_emp = v2x_gender,
    gdp_pc = e_gdppc,
    inf_mort = e_peinfmor,
    life_exp = e_pelifeex,
    education = e_peaveduc,
    region = e_regionpol_6C 
  ) |>   mutate(
    region = case_match(region, 
                        1 ~ "Eastern Europe", 
                        2 ~ "Latin America",  
                        3 ~ "Middle East",   
                        4 ~ "Africa", 
                        5 ~ "The West", 
                        6 ~ "Asia")
  )
```
